verdict.summary: Container's HEALTHCHECK command is failing â€” the application isn't ready or the check is misconfigured.

dead_ends.why_fails: Container appears healthy but may not actually be serving traffic

dead_ends.action: Setting the health check to always return 0
dead_ends.why_fails: Defeats the purpose; orchestrators think the container is always healthy

workarounds.action: Debug the health check: docker inspect --format='{{.State.Health}}' <container>
workarounds.how: Shows the last N health check results and exit codes

workarounds.action: Test the health command inside the container: docker exec <container> curl -f http://localhost:8080/health
workarounds.how: Run the same command the HEALTHCHECK uses to see what fails
